Posts.Content: Hippiechick wrote: Is anyone beginning rads in Early April?  I will be going 5  days a week for 6 weeks.  I still have one Chemo of Taxol/neulasta to go in 2 weeks. I am anxious about rads for some reason.  I've been though hell and back with chemo, you'd think I'd be looking forward to getting a break, but for some reason I have a lot of anxiety.  Anyone else ever feel this way? May you be at peace; may you be free of suffering Dx 8/18/2010, IDC, 1cm, Grade 2, 4/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: April Rads Hippiechick Hippiechick
